mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reply(rno, bno, reply, replyer) VALUES(seq_tbl_reply.NEXTVAL, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.select: SELECT rno FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX(tbl_reply idx_reply) */ rownum rn, rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyregdate, replymoddate FROM tbl_reply WHERE bno = #{bno} AND rno > 0 AND rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) WHERE rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}
